column5: Almost had a chance at a day off today when my boss was so kind enough to come pick me up so I won't miss work today   There goes my snow day! Meh rather be at work than stuck in the house all day I guess. Killer storm though!
Nope! That's one downfall with the 4x4. Nobody will believe you if you say your snowed in!
Not anymore, my daughter wanted to go to the store a mile away yesterday, ya right. Didn`t make it out the drive. Kids, they have a plan?  Had to have them shovel a path so the dogs could bust out!
Time to get rid of the wall the snow plow has left in front on my driveway.
Well I'm off to shovel for a couple of hours...............again  Al SpoonMaster lures
Well.... we got an inch of snow late last nite.... does that count???  Im glad I live in the North.. it never snows up here????

EH!   T.J ... are you sure it wasn't closer to 1 1/2 inches   I had to turn on my wipers to get rid of the snow this morning...  Absolutely ridiculous !!   barely any snow in the NORTH.... esti.....just ice.      Randy.
